ing: 3 fluid ounces lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage
des: "A very refreshing drink for hot summer days. Be careful, though - it is easy to have too many of these."
ins: Combine the gin, vodka, lime juice, and triple sec in a shaker with ice. Shake, and strain into a chilled pint glass with ice. Pour in lemon-lime soda, and serve.
